Package es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.pair

Class DistanceWithoutLink<U>

java.lang.Object
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.pair.AbstractPairMetric<U>
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.sna.metrics.pair.DistanceWithoutLink<U>
Type Parameters:
U - type of the users.
All Implemented Interfaces:
PairMetric<U>
public class DistanceWithoutLink<U>
extends AbstractPairMetric<U>
Computes the distance between two nodes in the network, considering that the link does not exist. If there is no link, the usual distance is computed.
Author:
Javier Sanz-Cruzado (javier.sanz-cruzado@uam.es), Pablo Castells (pablo.castells@uam.es)
